meanings.sent1: The fulgurating sun reflected off the water, creating a dazzling sight.
meanings.sent2: The stars in the night sky appeared fulgurating, twinkling brightly above.
meanings.sent3: Her smile was so fulgurating that it seemed to light up the entire room.
meanings.sent4: The fulgurating fireworks painted the sky with bursts of brightness.
meanings.sent5: The fulgurating neon sign outside the store caught everyone's attention.

meanings.sent1: The storm clouds grew dark and fulgurating, warning of an approaching thunderstorm.
meanings.sent2: The fulgurating bolts of lightning lit up the night sky with their powerful flashes.
meanings.sent3: The fulgurating lightning strikes made the night seem like a grand light show.
meanings.sent4: The fulgurating lightning danced across the sky, illuminating the clouds.
meanings.sent5: The fulgurating storm outside made the windows rattle with each lightning strike.

meanings.sent1: The gemstones on her necklace were fulgurating, catching the light with every movement.
meanings.sent2: The fulgurating chandelier in the ballroom added a touch of elegance to the event.
meanings.sent3: The fulgurating disco ball spun, casting shimmering lights across the dance floor.
meanings.sent4: Her dress sparkled with fulgurating sequins, making her the center of attention.
meanings.sent5: The fulgurating fireworks display left everyone in awe of its brilliance.
